mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FAQ WHERE NUM > 0 AND (TITLE LIKE concat('%', #{search},'%') or CONTENTS LIKE concat('%', #{search},'%')) AND CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY NUM DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{perPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ (NUM,ID,TITLE,CONTENTS, CATEGORY, REGDATE) VALUES (#{num},#{id},#{title},#{contents},#{category},now())
mapper.update: UPDATE FAQ SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENTS=#{contents}, CATEGORY=#{category} WHERE NUM=#{num}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(NUM) FROM FAQ WHERE (TITLE LIKE concat('%', #{search},'%') or CONTENTS LIKE concat('%', #{search},'%')) AND CATEGORY = #{category}
